greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: G.f.: sum(k>=0, 2^k*t*(1+t)/(1-t)^3, t=x^2^k).
maple: nmax:=47: for p from 0 to ceil(simplify(log[2](nmax))) do for n from 1 to ceil(nmax/(p+2)) do a((2*n-1)*2^p) := 2^p*(2^(p+1) - 1)*(2*n-1)^2 od: od: seq(a(n), n=1..nmax); # _Johannes W. Meijer_, Jan 28 2013
results.author: _Ralf Stephan_, Jan 18 2004
